transcript.title: INDONESIA’S AGREEMENT WITH THE IMF
transcript.content:
I welcome the agreement announced today between Indonesia and the

IMF on a strengthened package of reforms to restore market confidence

in Indonesia.

By signing the Letter of Intent with IMF Managing Director, Mr Camdessus,

President Soeharto has demonstrated his personal commitment to this

economic programme.

Full and timely implementation is fundamental to Indonesia's

strengthened economic programme.
